text:
An applicant who has terminated employment without good cause within 45 days of the submission of an application of aid may be denied aid. If an applicant is denied aid on this basis, the applicant may request a fair hearing and a determination will be made as to whether or not good cause existed for the applicant's decision to terminate his or her employment. 
(Amended by Ord. 271-81, App. 5/21/81)
